data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Bennarellini from Costa Rica (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Cixiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Holzinger, Werner E., Kunz, Gernot (2006): A new genus and species of Bennarellini from Costa Rica (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Cixiidae). Zootaxa 1353: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174552
